tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I'm very much happy & delighted to share my experience with Dr. Sudha Madhuri madam, It was really a great and amazing experience with you, Such a wonderful doctor you are. I have visited this doctor in the last trimester (9th month)of my pregnancy and we were very much worried that we have changed our doctor and came to a new person in the peak time but all those worries went into vain after meeting you. With all your friendly, soothing & positive words I became very much confident that I'm in safer hands. She maintains all the patient records very nicely & updates the record after every visit to her. She spends ample time towards patients and listens all our queries and addresses them in a polite way. She is always approachable at any time over calls or messages to address our concerns. She treats with utmost care and prescribes only minimal medicines and encourages for only normal delivery. She was more friendly to me, and I was very comfortable with her and she explained about the delivery process many times very patiently as I was afraid of having normal delivery. She removed all the fears and provided much support during my labour. But at the end, due to some issues I have opted for C section and she even motivated me after chosing c sec. But finally I have delivered a Beautiful Baby Girl under her supervision and post pregnancy follow up is also awesome. We were extremely happy and fully satisfied with your treatment & we made a good decision by choosing you in my pregnancy journey. Will never forget ur care towards me and ur smiling face and words u said after delivering my baby. Finally I would extend my sincere gratitude to you and it was my pleasure to meet such a wonderful person like u. From bottom of my heart i would thank you for making my journey smoother & successful. I would highly recommend this doctor. Hope you make many smiles alike us to all the patients with your treatment!! Wishing you all the best :)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: ****** ** ****** ************** She proactively took care of every small health issue during my twin pregnancy and gave me confidence that I am in safe hands. One of the best things about the doctor is that she is available round the clock for any kind of emergencies. She is very friendly and gives ample time during each visit. Even though my delivery took place unexpectedly at 3PM in the midnight , doctor and her entire team were available for me within few minutes after reaching the hospital. Would definately recommend the doctor for twin pregnancy care and delivery.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I am writing this after visiting 4-5 doctors in city.
For me doctor Sudha Madhuri was like my blessing goddess to me.
She was like my own family, guiding caring through me lowest phase of my life  and also took me to the best.

She is the best doctor best medicine provider best decision maker on time. you can trust her blindly.

I wish I could hug her when we visited her last, but covid didnt allowed.

I know there is nothing in this world which I can give her is equal to the happiness she has given us.

It has been 2 years and not a single day passes I dont think about her and thank her.

she is blessing for anyone.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr. Sudha madhuri mam is the most friendly, polite and helpful gynae i met so far. Before her i visited 2 more gynae but was not satisfied but after meeting her i was sure i met the correct doctor. She explains everything so patiently and politely that i never felt as if i was talking to a doctor. And she guided me in every stage of my pregnancy even after i went to my hometown at 7 month of my pregnancy . She was always available to answer all my queries. Before visiting her i had 2 miscarriages and was literally broken but she explained every possible reason for that to happen to me so patiently that i was sure that this time everything will be fine. Thank u mam for everything. Forever grateful to you.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,
review: We must say we are lucky that we consulted Dr. Sudha Madhuri , we were new to Hyderabad and had no references from fiends and family whom to consult , after self research we decided to go with Dr. Sudha and believe me it was the best decision we made in life , she is not only excellent in her profession but also have high self ethics and compassion for her patients , she came down in 3:30 in morning to our delivery we can‚Äôt believe it till now , with her support and care we are now proud parents of our first child ! Thanks for everything !

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: *** ** *** **** * ******* *** ** * **** we met her to take second opinion from her related to severe pain after ectopic pregnancy done in rainbow. seriously rainbow doctor left us clue less for my stomache pain . sudha mam referred all my history and gave very simple medicine to treat my pain. she is very much available and supportive in whatsapp. i never met this kind of lady doctor in my life she is very calm and peaceful she will not let u go until u feel confident about the problem. she is perfect example of a doctor and a women who take care her patients like mother. these words are not just for the sake of feedback . these are truly from my heart. our family wish doctor should live long to treat people like us.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Visited 4 hospitals and 6 doctors before meeting Dr Sudha Madhuri mam, our search for the best gynecologist ended with Dr Sudha Madhuri Mam. My wife had lot of serious (life threatening) complications in the first delivery due to which were worried a lot, but after meeting dr sudha Madhuri Mam, we had confidence for the present issue, everything went smoothly and there were not a single problem during and after c-section delivery. All thanks to Dr Sudha Madhuri mam, she listens to the patients (for every small issues) very calmly and understands them by giving enough time then she explains all your queries very sweetly in your understandable language and prescribes precise medicines. And above all she is available all the time to the patients.
If one is n search for best gynecologist in hyderabad can definitely visit her. If rating is given in star it will be off course 5 stars.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review: We visited the doctor after conception of twins . With diabetes and twins we approached Dr SudhaMadhuri who take care of us very carefully end to end until 34 weeks of completion. We delivered  healthy babies and the entire process was hassle free . We would recommend the doctor for sure to who ever is wanting high risk pregnancy care . The doctor is so friendly and explains the problem and solution to the patient in a very detailed way with lot of patience .

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: To begin with, dr Sudha will treat you as a patient and not a customer so u noe ur in safe hands. I visited the doctor after seeing almost 10 other doctors and was most satisfied with the way she treated me. Mine was a complicated pregnancy since m diabetic and I was too anxious. She understood my anxiety and was extremely patient with me. ******** *** ****** ********* *********** ****** ***** ** ********** I would come across something and ask her for tests, etc but she would explain that unless something is wrong, those tests aren‚Äôt necessary. The bottom line is from being told by a doctor that I can‚Äôt conceive to delivering a healthy baby naturally isn‚Äôt an easy feat and Dr Sudha supported us throughout the journey. Even when I went for post partum  check up, she was very warm. She actually came out of the clinic to our car to meet our baby and that says a lot considering she is so busy. Overall you will find a very warm person who will guide you through your journey and be extremely supportive. I would strongly recommend her. We will always remain grateful to her. My husband calls her our angel.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: *** ** ** *** *** ****** ***** ****** ******* ************ ** **** ***** ********* I am so so so grateful that I had a chance of choosing her as my gynaecologist. So grounded, helpful, available,caring, 24*7 available for you..she treats you like her own, such a great soul,so polite, meeting her will take away all your problems.i used to wait for my consultations just to hear her. Even during pandemic she was so available everytime we needed her. You will never regret your decision..just go for her. Not only during pregnancy,even after that she keeps a check on you, your baby's health. Any problem,she is just a chat away. Our full family have tested positive recently and she always checks on us,sends us doc recommendations, whatever is best to her knowledge she guides us with those information.. I just can't tell you how great you will feel once you have her in your life. I'm lucky and grateful to God for blessing me with her..Also, you will have your best pregnancy journey with her. She is full of love & care ..I want to have another child ,so that I can meet her again üòÅSuch a great human being she is..She will leave a strong impact in your life for sure..I still miss her a lot..I wish I could meet her every now and then.. pls if you want to have a safe and beautiful pregnancy, close your eyes and go visit her.

Had to wait for 2 hours though I had a booking and was on time.  Doctor answered our questions in bits and pieces and it fleets rushed. Consultation finished in just 5 mins. We weren‚Äôt given much time to process what she said and we didn‚Äôt have any questions at that moment, as we were first time parents

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Words fall short to express how grateful I am for the care and treatment she has given during my journey to motherhood. She was there always via phone or WhatsApp whenever I needed her and this approach made me comfortable though I had a very complicated pregnancy. ******* ********** **** ********* ** *** ******* she is also a very good human being. To me Dr. Sudha Madhuri means you are in safest hands

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: I came to doctor for a second opinion as I was sceptical of using hormone medicines. But she was quick to make distinction between definitive treatment and symptomatic treatment. She went through my reports and understood my concerns. I feel more confident having talked to her and will follow her treatment to see how my body responds to it.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
We had a baby boy 4 days ago via normal delivery(instrumental). We thought it would be a csection due to various reasons of pregnancy but our doctor Sudha Madhuri was very positive about normal delivery and encouraged us throughout to made it happen. 
 We are very grateful to her and personally recommend to others as well. Trust me, you will be in safe hands. She is simply amazing. Can't thank her enough.

review: We consulted sudha ma'am for pre and post pregnancy care. She was really informative and has immense patience to explain the situation in layman terms. We were really happy with the way she had dealt during the delivery date, she was always available without leaving it to her subordinates. In conclusion you can rely upon her skill level, commitment and her ability to take challenge head on. Thank you.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We consulted doctor for my wife's PCOD problem. We already had a child and were thinking about planning for second child when we consulted doctor. She prescribed medicines for irregular menstrual cycle and suggested to take folic acid, but my wife didnt take it folic acid since we were unsure. My wife conceived next month and we found that in 7th week. Our journey from 8th week to delivery had been smooth despite of few complications my wife faced. Doctor prescribed right medicines to overcome all complications. She gives chance to patients to ask questions and answers in detail. Always available a text away for queries. I didn't get a chance to express gratitude in person, so I'm taking this as an opportunity to thank Sudha madam for smooth experience.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,
review: Gem of a person having wonderful diagnostic abilities. I had very good experience with Dr. Sudha. The way he takes care of his patients is uncommon. He is very humble and gives ample time to each patients.

Doctor gave adequate time and was very conversational.  She offered inputs to address the issue we visited for. 
We had to wait longer despite having an appointment and we reaching before time.
